effect.Name: Addition With Tangent
effect.description: Addition With Tangent - Shader adds base and mixes colors with each other then colors are calculated by tangent
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Addition With Tangent (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader adds base and mixes colors with each other then colors are calculated by tangent

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of background visibility
